Package com.trinhxuantam.threadsafesinglylinkedlist.controllers

Class LinkedListController

java.lang.Object
com.trinhxuantam.threadsafesinglylinkedlist.controllers.LinkedListController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/linkedlist") public class LinkedListController extends Object
Controller class for handling requests related to the linked list.

    • addElement

      @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ListDTO<Integer>> addElement(@RequestBody AddElementDTO dto)
      Adds an element to the end of the linked list.
      Parameters:
      dto - The data transfer object containing the element to be added
      Returns:
      The updated list of elements

    • insertAfter

      @PostMapping("/insertAfter") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ListDTO<Integer>> insertAfter(@RequestBody InsertElementDTO dto)
      Inserts an element after a specified element in the linked list.
      Parameters:
      dto - The data transfer object containing the element to be inserted and the element after which it should be inserted
      Returns:
      The updated list of elements

    • removeLast

      @DeleteMapping("/pop") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ListDTO<Integer>> removeLast()
      Removes the last element from the linked list.
      Returns:
      The updated list of elements

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ListDTO<Integer>> getAllElements()
      Gets all elements in the linked list.
      Returns:
      The list of elements
